SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &TEMP_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"\cmd-&$RUNID#.txt") : SET &FLAG#="0" : SET &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# = "ver" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_RUN_COMMAND@WIN if(!$?) { $errors = 1 }
$count=@( Get-Content "&UC4RB_OUTPUT_LOG#" | Where-Object { $_.Contains("Windows") } ).Count
